  • Method Details

    • useEffect

      public void useEffect(PlayerActionPhase currentPlayerActionPhase, Island island, Color color, List<Color> srcColors, List<Color> dstColors) throws InvalidCharacterException, InvalidActionException
      Uses the correct effect of a PassiveCharacter
      Specified by:
      useEffect in class Character
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerActionPhase - the PlayerActionPhase which the effect is used in
      island - the Island which the Character affects
      color - the Color which the Character affects
      srcColors - the students to be moved to the destination
      dstColors - the students to be moved to the source (only if the effect is a "swap" effect)
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterException - if the Character is not a PassiveCharacter
      InvalidActionException - if the selected Color is null
